definitions.text: the process of removing impurities (as from oil or metals or sugar etc.)
improve or perfect by pruning or polishing
make more complex, intricate, or richer
treat or prepare so as to put in a usable condition
reduce to a fine, unmixed, or pure state; separate from extraneous matter or cleanse from impurities
attenuate or reduce in vigor, strength, or validity by polishing or purifying
examples: many valuable nutrients are refined out of the foods in our modern diet

definitions.text: make more precise or increase the discriminatory powers of
examples: refine the constant in the equation
